entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
